title: Keys
body: Can anyone explain to me how do i get keys i have honor lvl 2 and i dont get keys at all

replies.body: [**Key fragments**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233) will sometimes be given to you as long as you're playing games and staying Honorable by avoiding penalties and chat restrictions. You won't see them right after matches necessarily, but they can pop up anytime you're browsing the client or when you login.
